subject: Simsonn plus x
description_text:
Hello
I ordered a full silver set, but I have received a black heelplate…..

conversations.body_text: Hi Mike Thorenfeldt,  Please provide your order number. We sincerely apologize for sending the wrong color. If you can accept the current color, we can offer a USD compensation, as the shipping cost for a return or exchange is much higher than the value of the baseplate.

I can accept the color :)
My order number is

#SSN4237

tors. 11. dec. 2025 kl. 02.28 skrev service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com
>:

> Hi Mike Thorenfeldt,
>
> Please provide your order number. We sincerely apologize for sending the
> wrong color. If you can accept the current color, we can offer a USD
> compensation, as the shipping cost for a return or exchange is much higher
> than the value of the baseplate.
>
> On Wed, 10 Dec at 1:02 PM , Mike Thorenfeldt <
> mikethorenfeldtpedersen99@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hello
> I ordered a full silver set, but I have received a black heelplate…..
>
> 7912:4206036
>

How much is compensation?

Hi Mike Thorenfeldt,    We have refunded $15 to you. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

15$ you must be joking, you can either take the 15$ or send me silver
heelplate for the pedal set.
Either that or a fair amount in compensation.
